description:
Winter Break has ended and the girls return for the New Year. Everyone is jealous that Yomi went to Hokkaido for break, so they plan a trip to the Magical Land theme park!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Lumoutunut Yomi - Petos - Innostunut - Ulkopuolinen - Mene!
Ukiyomi / Uragiri / Wakuwaku Wakuwaku / Nakama Hazure / Go
Yomi`s Exposure to the World / Betrayal / Excited, Excited, Excited, Excited / Left Out / Go!
Yomis Ausflug in die weite Welt / Betrug / Aufregend, aufregend, aufregend / Zuhause gelassen / Los!
うきよみ / 裏切り / ワクワクワクワク / 仲間はずれ / ゴー
